title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 415.5 - Erroneous payments to a claimant
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 415.5 - Erroneous payments to a claimant

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 289-c(3)

In the event of an erroneous or excessive payment to a
claimant, the Department of Taxation and Finance may recover such amount from
the claimant in the same manner as a tax imposed by article 12-A of the Tax

Law. Determinations of erroneous or excessive payments must be made within
three years after the date of such erroneous or excessive
payment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
415.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
